replies.msg:
花不開 花沒遺憾
種子沒發芽 也算存在過吧
黑與白 流動循環 歸零 成為一點

那麼 時空還有意義嗎？

生與死 和事件成就有關嗎？
還是使命在每一刻實現
存在的每一刻就是成就和成為

那麼 成敗還有意義嗎？

不是無神論 但又不是有神論
那中間的混沌算是什麼？
莊周夢碟 屬虛屬實
真的由我的視角獨裁嗎？
誰能說 還是誰都能說
天上天下 唯我獨尊

那麼 我有意義嗎？

花開花落之間
存在虛無之間
唯心唯物之間
心間澄明安樂

A flower that never bloom yet has no regret
A seed that never grow yet have been existing
Black and White
return as one in flux and cycle

As such, does time and space matters?

Life and death
What is so different with or without happening or achievement?
Or our mission is achieved in every moment as roles
That every moment of being is becoming

As such, does success or failure matter?

What is the world in between the existence and absence of God
Dream or reality
Am I the one who has the authority to dictate my perspective?
Who is able to tell
Or anyone can tell
”I am the only master above and below the Heaven”

As such, do ”I” matter?

In between blooming and dying
In between being and nothingness
In between subject and object
There is peace in between
